product_description: Vertical device mount Patented Quick Fit Keyhole mounting system allows cover installation under a minute Lockable Tabs and Spring hinge closure Three gang GFCI plus Adapter plates provide 125 in 1 possible configuration types NEMA 3R Compliant

reviews.review_body: Son muy buenos pero deberían de venir de otro color como blanco solo bien en gris
As described
Works
Fits great
Wish I had noted that this will not work with duplex decora switches... wasted a lot of effort
It said in the description it would work with Decora products.
Great
great cover
This worked out perfect for me.
work well.
worked well fast delivery
No issues, Exactly as described!
Perfect! As described. Fast shipping
Great Seller. Would Use Again. Thanks, Ron!
Did the job
good
quality is really good, we needed to get this in order to past the inspection for out outdoor porch, not stylish at all
Has a habit of turning the switches off as you close the covers.
Everything I expected without a electrician
Just what I needed. Matched the receptacle box perfectly. Plus, the optional plates for switches and regular receptacles is awesome.
Excellent outdoor switchplate/cover. We painted it to match our stucco walls. Good price too!
Its dificult to review. It worked as its intended, solid construction, attractive as a cover plate can be, lots of gaskets and possibilities with the setup
I like that it can lock.
3 gang outdoor cover.  Just as described
Reasonable quality overall
It works great

I like this product because I could find no other weatherproof 3 gang cover in stores or online. When center cover springs closed, it sometimes falls on latch at the bottom of the plate and has to be manually positioned to insure it closes properly.
Very well made, but when using a duplex Decora switch you turn the switch on every time you close the cover.
Good quality
Great product. Searched and searched locally and could not find 3 gang outdoor cover. Used for 3 light switch on new patio.

doing what it was made todo.  Howedver the right cover and hinge is slightly tweaked from the manufacturer.  Not visible but noticeable when the cover is lifted and just allowed to shut on its own.  The cover catches on the latch point and holdsit open about a quarter of an inch.

This item solved our problem; we (as electrical contractors) had installed a 3-gang switch box & planned on using a lever-type WP 3-gang cover available locally.  Then, customer decided they wanted dimmers; we searched & found this flip-cover & received it the day after after ordering it.  Our job was finished on time due to speedy shipping.
Great product I use this for a gazebo where my client needed 3 dimmers
Could not find a 3 gang outdoor cover anywhere.  Worked very well!!

Works perfectly
A little tricky to get installed make sure you use the longer screws that come with it

Does the job but is a little weird on the install.  It mounts to the screws of the outlets instead of screwing into the box.  Also the gasket is a little bigger than the box.  I mounted to a brick mounted electrical box

Good item at a good price. 3 gang covers are a little hard to find. Options found elsewhere on the Internet were as much as 3x the price paid here.
A little tricky to install as you have 3 switches moving around and need to line everything up right.  May be helpful to have a second person.
Good quality, sturdy, not cheaply made, all parts are metal, except the foam gaskets.

I'm happy with the item. Originally when I got and was getting ready to install it, I noticed that the dimensions were narrower compared to a regular wall plate. But I found a workaround and I applied silicone to the few milimiters of exposed difference between the wall and the box. The hinges were ok, and the quality seems long lasting. I say OK but I wish the dimensions would be wider than the box size, I'm not an electrician so I cannot judge if these are code dimensions or not. In the end, it's was very easy to install in 5 minutes.

There are not a lot of 3 gang choices out there, and this one seemed to fit the bill. It was not until I mounted it that I discovered that this unit does not close all the way for regular (old style) or decora duplex switch.  I ended up taking it apart and milling out the guts under the lid with a drill press so it would close and not touch the decora duplex switch, no way it would work for the regular duplex.  I did look for an extender, but could not find a 3 gang that was made of metal.
Received as ordered
It's what I needed the price was fair and delivery was quick
I was having hard time finding this item, & I was able to find it here & delivered soon to finalize my project!
Kind of a pain to install, but it does its job once installed.
Video Player is loading.

I recently purchased 6 of these for the light switches, ceiling fan controllers, and amplified keypads on our covered patio. The units are very well made and come with just about every switch/outlet adapter conceivable. The instructions were sparse and it was only after about 5 plates that I discovered it is easier to mount the switches to the unit first BEFORE attaching the plate to the electrical box. Also, I would recommend running a thin bead of caulk in between the rubber gasket and the wall. Finally, I also used a small amount of caulk over the screw openings to prevent water from getting in at those locations.

I used this product for a customers pool house outside switches. It works great it was slightly difficult to install as the center hole didnt quite fit around the switch but after I got that together it worked as intended
Easy to install, well made and arrived quickly

Good product but let's clarify the terms of waterproof. This product is water resistant not waterproof. Waterproof means you can submerge into the water. Water resistance mean it's okay on the rain but not submerging.

product_title: Simple Designs LT2009 BLU Mini Egg Oval Ceramic Table Desk Lamp Blue
product_description: Mini oval ceramic base with matching fabric shade Perfect for living room bedroom office kids room or college dorm Height 9 45 Shade diameter 5 5 Uses 1 x 40W type B E12 Candelabra Base bulb not included LAMP IS A MINI LAMP PLEASE SEE DETAILS FOR HEIGHT

reviews.review_body: This lamp is the perfect addition to my kitchen windowsill...  and the perfect night light for those late-night trips to the fridge.  ??

I bought this for my kitchen counter and it exactly what I was looking for. It's tiny. But that is made clear in the description. Anyone surprised by the size, didn't pay close attention to what they were purchasing. I had no problem finding light bulbs that fit. Very pleased with this item.
Cute tiny lamp.  I have it on my dresser to add a little light near my jewelry box.  Perfect.  For a very inexpensive small lamp it does the job.

This is way to small for what I was looking for. Cute though I am really aggravated it needs a special bulb. Every one I have tried sticks out and you can see it over the shade. If I return it,I lose money. Ridiculous.

When they say mini, it's mini, smaller then a box of Orange juice, I wasn't expecting it to be so small

Also it uses candleabra bulbs not regular standard sockets

I think as long as you got it in a high place it's good otherwise The light kind of gets in your eyes

But really guys it's a good lamp I'm not complaing just informing you

4/5 stars for me
This lamp is light weight and cute for a child's room.  The light bulbs are more like chandelier bulbs though and a bit large for the lamp shade to cover.  It works though for what I needed.
it is nice, had not realized it took a different bulb than standard.

These lamps are so tiny. I guess they are ok for maybe a very small space, maybe a desk.. I dont yet. I mean tiny. I bought these with the intention  of using them as bedside lamps but i feel they are just too small for me. However, they are really cute and sturdy. They take the smaller bulbs.
Love the switch on the cord and they are small tea lights, cute and sweet perfect

These lamps are adorable - - - keep in mind the size.  They are MINI lamps...meaning that they are quite small.  As a pair, they are adorable on, say, either corner of a dresser - surprisingly, they give off quite a bit of light.  I'm using some Phillips 40w equivalent LED bulbs that do well and give off warm light.

It does exactly what I needed it for, which is purely an aesthetic look.  It is very small, so if you were looking for something that gives off a lot of light, this is not it. I was looking something for my desk that just gave a soft glow, and it does this perfectly. I would compare it to a nightlight but in a lamp form. Bulbs from the dollar store fit this lamp, you just have to make sure you get one with a very tiny base. I am very happy with my purchase!
I just needed some light in a dark corner of my kitchen. It out out good light and a worked for what I needed

Very cute LITTLE lamp. I was expecting a small lamp based on the measurements and other reviews I read. My 7 year old daughter has this in her room. She is rough on things and it wasn't but a day before she broke the part that secures the shade to the lamp. This doesn't effect the functionality of the lamp though. It does take the very small socket bulbs - like the size used in a night light.
Smaller than I thought but still cute.  I had a different plan in mind but now I’ll use it as a night-light.
No lo he podido usar no tiene bombillas
The lamp is great. The problem I encountered is with the bulb. Listing said use E12 bulb. I ordered Amazon choice at the same time . The bulbs are too tall and stick out above the shade ..
Regular flame shaped bulbs stick up higher than the shade at the top, so make sure you get the shortest bulb possible.
Need to purchase a light bulb for the lamp.
Cute

If you leave on your lamp to read. It gets hot and makes the plastic ring to become brittle and break. Maybe with the lamp shade use all metal instead of plastic. But I guess you get when you buy cheap.

I bought this tiny lamp because the price was great, previous lamps from this seller have been wonderful. So what happened with manufacturing this lamp is inexplicable. The shade was placed upside down, its frame was detached and separating it from the lamp showed a broken shade. It had been returned 3 times, although this was not made clear at time of purchase. It was cost more to return it, than to purchase a replacement lamp, so in the garbage it goes, it is not fixable.

Only giving 4 stars because the description leads one to believe a candelabra bulb with the dipping tip is presentable but the height may not be presentable like walking in and viewing from above. I am using a C7 7W nightlight (used in wall nightlight) for this.  Quite light enough as a mood lamp.
For heaven's sakes, folks, look at the size given BEFORE ordering. Most negative reviews are because "the lamp was too small"". This is a SMALL (maybe even tiny) lamp
These are really cute- but much smaller than you'd think!
Good little light.

I bought this lamp and when I got it I saw that it was small. The lamp is as advertised. One of the things I did not see on the advertisement is that the lamp uses a 40 watt candelabra type of light. I had a few laying around and used one of them. The lamp works like a charm. It is a good product. I have it programmed with a smart plug and it works well. I am very happy with this product and highly recommend it.
Make sure to purchase the correct bulbs!!  This lamp is perfect for my needs.
I had to hot glue the lamp shade to the white metal brace in order for the shade to sit properly, Not assembled very good.

Got this for a nightstand. It’s small which is perfect for what I was purchasing it for. However, I ordered a purple lamp, paid the higher price for the color and got a navy blue one instead. I didn’t bother sending it back because it the need to have the lamp was higher than worrying about the color. I can paint it later.

The lamp shade should have been designed to cover the entire light bulb, SO looking at the lamp could be very bright for with the top of the bulb poking out. Maybe I can find a shorter bulb, Other than that it's a great lamp.
They are so CUTE BUT SMALL. ID SAY THEIR GOOD FOR NURSERY OR SMALL CHILDS ROOM.
Good lamp for a desktop. Very small but decent quality for the price.

Perfect for the nursery, nephews room is decorated in cowvboy, I wrapped this lamp
and shade with rope, to cute
Didn't realize it takes a special bulb
I needed a small table lamp for my breakfast table. This fits the bill. It provides modest but good illumination and takes up almost no space. It is well made. Most highly recommended.
Smaller than I planned on, but okay sitting on dresser.  Lights area well.

So other reviewers noted how small they are.  They were not wrong.  These are small.  The base is about the size of a soda can.  And someone mentioned bulbs sticking out the top.  It's true.  Use night light bulbs or Xmas window candle bulbs and they look great.

Nice small lamp that I use for my home's bar area. I had some slim chandelier light bulbs that fit just fine. This is a small lamp and is a nice accent item but if you're looking to use it as a reading lamp, you might need to get brighter bulbs and elevate it. Alternatively, it can be used as a pretty effective night light if you have elderly folk who need some light at night to get around... It does look really nice in my bar area and gives it a neat ambience without taking up much space. I was looking for something small and this works very well for my needs.
Updated : I liked this so much, I got a second one. Takes standard chandelier bulbs. Warm lighting.

I did not read this description properly and think I got excited when I saw the price. It is exactly what I was looking for - a bedside white lamp. When the item arrived I was so disappointed with the size - mainly  my fault as I did not read the description clearly. That aside the lamp was very poor quality and actually had the shade falling off of the wire at the top. Even if this had been the correct size I would not rust the quality. This might work if you wanted a lamp for decorative purposes in a book shelf or something but honestly cant think of a situation where this lamp would be suited for given the quality and size.
I ordered a "small"" lamp. I didn't know it was a ""micro"" lamp. It is VERY SMALL.  Maybe the base is 4 inches. I had a good laugh

This little lamp is such a cute room accessory. The colors offer bright options. Bear in mind that the lamp is little! It's made for a small night stand or table. It would be sweet on a dresser or in a nursery or young child's room. Definitely versatile! At 40 watts, it's definitely brighter than a nightlight, but it doesn't fill a room with bright light; the light is soft. I purchased an orange one for a small night stand and have purchased a blue one for my dresser. The 2 together will light up my bedroom well - one alone will keep it soft. The only disadvantage to this cute little lamp is that it is lightweight, so falls over easily.
Video Player is loading.
Not much else to say. Paint is good, shade is a near perfect color match.

Buy the right bulbs and enjoy. I have one on my back patio where I sit and listen to podcasts at night, and one in a guest bathroom for a nightlight. On windy evenings the outdoor one has to be brought in, it is not weighted enough to stay on the table. These are the bulbs I use, they are perfect. https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089ZVSY2X/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&psc=1

I needed a small lamp for my desk & this is perfect. It’s small but the lighting is perfect. This worked out on being exactly what I needed for my desk area. Be sure to buy the bulbs, they’re not included.
Was smaller than expected but was for a kids room

This was alot smaller then I expected, but it's working fine. It uses G type bulb. I purchased a G16 for it and it's working well. I thought about buying an LED G16 to save energy, but LED tend to burn very hot and the lamp suggest using bulb of 40 watts maximum because chance of fire.
I also like that the light switch is on the cord instead of on the lamp itself, because I have it on my night stand and it's easier to reach being on the cord.

I would suggest Amazon to tell customers buying this lamp the light bulb recommended for this lamp.

Update 12-13-2014
I liked this lamp at first, but I got tired of it being so darn tiny and light that any little movement knocks it over.
If you want something sturdy then this is not the lamp for you, I still have it in working order, but it's sitting on a pile of stuff right now. I bought a full size table lamp to replace it.

Love everything about it , its better than described , not bulky not too small not too big fits just right on side table,  long chord easy to turn rolling on off switch,  the color is a perfect blue very light yet sturdy

Lamp is NOT as pretty as photo shows, Color of shade is black - NOT indigo - and light does NOT shine through. I poked holes in mine to make a star-light effect, very pretty! The base color is more of a bland plastic-looking grayish-blue (although it is ceramic).
It's definitely better than a nightlight. It will only take the small nightlight bulbs but they come in 15w, not just 4w, so it's perfect for me. I had purchased 40w candleabra bulbs for it but they are super-bright and too tall.
Almost gave this 3 stars but I'm making it work and it's very solid, well-made lamp.
Very lightweight, really too much for where i wanted to use them.
I thought the lamp was bigger but it's okay for a small room.
Smaller than expected, but very cute!

The light is really nice and cute. My only issue is the size. Hence, the word “mini” on the description. I wanted to take a chance anyway. It’s much smaller than her current lamp but it’s cute. My daughter will keep it for now but we’ll definitely be changing it. Other than this it really is nice.

This lamp is definitely mini, but it's perfect for a night light in the nursery. The problem I had is light bulb related possibly. I bought the bulbs recommended in the product description and put it in to try. It was a little too tall and could be seen but no big deal to me. The problem was the heat emitted by the bulb while on. It was all the same specs the company recommended but did not make me feel comfortable leaving it on for even 5 minutes. It's an adorable lamp though and seems just fine with a night light bulb for now. As you can see in the picture, I customized the white lamp. (40W bulb was attempted prior to customization)

It's much smaller than I thought it was going to be and had other issues. The lamp uses candelabra style bulbs so normal bulbs won't fit. The area inside the shade for the bulbs is tiny and even normal candelabra style bulbs (the ones shaped like "fire"" that go in candelabras) stick a half inch out the top of the thing."

I bought three of these little lights in 2015 for rarely used guest rooms in our house.  They are tiny, which is just what I wanted, fit perfectly in the spots where I needed a small lamp, and are very classic looking.  However, that's where the compliments end.  The shade is held in place by the bulb - you put the shade on, then screw in the bulb.  They take special small bulbs with a small base like flame chandelier bulbs, but shorter and round, which I ordered when I bought the lamps as someone else mentioned.  These bulbs are not very sturdy and the shade fits so loosely that with any contact at all, it tips off its base and hits the bulb.  This has caused the bulb to break off from its base so the light doesn't work and is somewhat hazardous as well.  Over the 3 years I had these lamps, all 3 of them have had this issue at least once and they in rooms that only get used 3-4 times each year.  I have now shifted to regular sturdy flame-shaped bulbs which stick out of the top of the shade a little but seem more able to withstand bumps from the shade.  I am considering completely replacing them, this is too much effort and the bulbs are not cheap!  Choose wisely.
Cute little light. Used a night light bulb. Perfect little kitchen light

I initially ordered an orange one, for a MCM bathroom....super cute nightlight in lieu of too bright overhead.  Loved it so much I ordered one for my kitchen coffee area, as an initial, “not yet ready for bright lights” light, but the shade arrived dented, you can’t “undent”, it still shows imperfections, however, I’m taking a chance and ordering a third, for my master bath “night light”.  Fingers crossed it arrives as the first one did.  If they would improve packaging for shipment, this would be a Five Star item.

I needed two small lamps to sit on either side of my bed. My nightstands are narrow so I needed something as small as possible. These things were perfect! A lot of the negative reviews are that they're small, which is true, so if you're looking for something for a living room side table or larger nightstand, I would look elsewhere. If you're like me and looking for a space saving lamp for beside your bed then these are for you. Also, people were saying they were dull but I have no issue with the light they give off. I got 5W LED's and the two lamps together give off enough light for me. You could probably use one next to a bed but it wouldn't illuminate much of the room. This photo was taken with both lamps on at night and as you can see, there's ample light. You can also see their size compared to my bed. I give it a 5 star because I knew going in I was getting a tiny lamp and it does exactly what I need.

Lamp is small which makes it good for a night light, however the bowling pin shape makes it much too easy to knock over.  Shade is cheaply made.  It dents easily and dents don’t come out.  The bulb recommended for it sticks up above shade. I’m using a night light bulb instead, which some reviewers recommended. Should have read those reviews first.

In spite of its faults the lamp is attractive. However I am not using it by the bed as it could be too  easily knocked over.  Instead I put it on a shelf with an item next to it to make it more secure.

I’ll still get some use out of the lamp, but not on the table by the bed.

The biggest disappointment is the shade, which must be a Dollar Tree reject.

Love it! I ordered gray and it looks to me like a bit of a greenish gray but not bad enough to make me return it. It’s a perfect little lamp. I use it as a night light with a 4W nightlight bulb and it helps me find my my to bed without tripping in the dark or having to turn on the bright light if my husband’s sleeping. It can be used with a brighter bulb too for more light. It looks very pretty on my dresser and would go great just about anywhere.  I’ll be ordering another one.
Perfect
The bottom looks like a dinosaur egg or possibly a Negg from Neopets - very nice!!
Stopped working after 2 months

I laughed my head off when I opened the box. Even though I measured and I  knew what to expect, it still took me by surprise to see how minute this lamp is in real life! I have a basket of goose eggs, and this diminutive lamp base is almost the exact same size!

I love it though. It’s perfect as a night light in our downstairs guest bathroom. I have just ordered another for the upstairs guest bathroom.

Note: I found that a traditional chandelier bulb, which is the size base it has, is too tall and it protruded out of the top of the lampshade, so I’m using a 4 watt nightlight bulb. Consider ordering some of those while you’re at it ;-)

A friend came over last night and I was telling her about my new, Lilliputian lamp. Right there and then she ordered two for her bathrooms :-D
Just what I needed
Very cute but very small more for a night light or bedside light

This lamp is perfect! It is EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED! I needed a very small lamp to fit on a wall shelf in my son's nursery. Nothing too bright, just enough so it wasn't pitch black for my baby boy during rocking and feedings, 40 watts does just the job just right! I've seen a lot of complaints that people thought they were buying a full sized lamp. It clearly states in the title that this is a "Mini Lamp"". If you scroll down to the ""Technical Details"" (which you should always do if you are buying anything online) it says that the height of the lamp is 9.4 inches and that the width of the lamp shade is 5.5 inches. This worked perfectly for me as my wall shelf is only 7 inches wide. To give you a better idea of the size

So aggravating when you expect a small table lamp for a bedside table and get this toy size thing instead. This lamp isn’t even  the size of a coffee cup. It is easy to knock over because it’s so lightweight. More a night light than an actual lamp. The bulb sticks up higher than the shade, making the shade pointless, it just looks silly. My bad for not checking dimensions but I thought it would at least be an actual lamp . Dumb purchase. Unless you are looking for a Nite light, don’t bother with this. ????
This lamp is tiny .. it does not look like the pictures. However it is a perfect little night light
Way smaller than expected but that's Amazon for you

This is a really cute little lamp.  Stupidly, I didn't look at the measurements before buying...just that it was a good price.  I actually laughed when I opened it...it's SO tiny.  My granddaughter took it for her bathroom.

I purchased this lamp for my small bathroom counter since I don’t like overhead lighting. It is the perfect size for my use. Almost like a nightlight. It gets the job done. I’ve had no issues with it so far.

I love how simple the lamp is. It was a bit of a bummer that it didn’t come with at least 1 light bulb but I was able to find one around the house so I wasn’t too upset. I originally purchased this for my kitchen as I’m going for a slow living vibe but thought it was adorable in my room instead. I like to put this lamp on as I do yoga at night. It doesn’t illuminate my whole room (I have a very large room) but it provides a nice ambiance!

The shade is only 4.5” tall but was advertised to be 5.75”. So the bulb extends higher than the shade. It requires a type b (candelabra) bulb.

Otherwise my daughter loves it
It was very very small for size I thought it would be small but not that small.

This is a review of: Simple Designs LT2009-OFF Mini Egg Oval Ceramic Table Lamp, Off-White
 I returned this product because it was too tall for my space.  With the exception of Sturdiness, I consider myself qualified to review the above categories.  This lamp is aesthetically appealing with a design that can compliment many decor styles and is a great value for the money.  I gave 3 Stars for Sturdiness because I couldn’t evaluate the durability of the lamp which resulted in my 4 Star overall product review.  My house is still under renovations from Hurricane Michael in 2018; however, I have a space in mind for this lamp and will probably repurchase it when the time is right.  I recommend this product.  This review was written by LynKin.

It is not this company's fault that when the cute, small, and I do mean small, lamp arrived that I took it out of the box and looked at it and everything was fine - it's cute in the way Pee-wee league baseball players are - that my dog then ate the lampshade (two bites  tops. Small lamp=smaller lampshade. But, it IS this companies fall for not replying to my three, separate requests to purchase - purchase at full price - a new lampshade. No reply. Not a yes. Not a no. No nothing. Silence. It's not like you can go up to Walmart and buy a teeny tiny orange lamp shade. Amazon should consider where they want this company to continue selling through Amazon, not because my dog ate one of its lampshades that I purchased, but because it won't respond to its customers for a simple replacement item I was willing to pay for.

This lamp is the perfect small little lamp to go into a cabinet as decor. Only downside was it needed a very specific small light bulb which I didn’t know initially. But Amazon had just what we needed (see below).

SHINESTAR 3-Pack E12 LED Ceiling Fan Light Bulbs 2700K Warm White, Small Candelabra Base 6w (60w Equivalent), Globe Shape A15 Bulbs, High CRI 85+ for Natural and Radiant Colors, Non-Dimmable https://a.co/d/3SwQU0O

I actually ordered this lamp thinking it was MUCH bigger than what it was. However, I came to find out that it served as the perfect night light for my little ones room. It gives off the perfect dim glow that really is great for bedtime!

This is a beautiful little lamp and potentially very serviceable for someone. The switch is describe as rotary in the description, and I assumed this meant the twisty knob on the socket. It is not--it is an inline switch which in fairness does twist. This won't work for me as I need something I can easily find and quickly turn on in the dark, in time to see the caller ID on my phone. This would involve too much fumbling. When it arrived the inner product box showed crush damage. Unfortunately, the shade had been crushed inside as well. It should never have been sent out with obvious damage to the box, without inspection, but that would slow things down at the warehouse, wouldn't it (note: the outer box was not damaged so it was shipped that way). I will return it, but it is a shame as it is such a beautiful tiny lamp for next to my bedroom phone.

Update: We initiated an exchange for this and got the new lamp in 2 days. There was a little damage to the box but on the base end not the shade end. The shade was fine. We like it so much we decided to use it in another location where finding the switch quickly in the dark is not a issue. So we are completely happy with it now. Doesn't seem to be a problem of the shade getting too hot as one reviewer mentioned. Maybe they were using a bulb with too many watts. Works fine with the recommended 40 watt bulb. You can always go to LED for less heat or more light.
The lamp was exactly like I wanted. Unfortunately it dropped on my floor and shattered completely. Now it’s a bare spot on my table. I have not received the bulb I ordered with the lamp.
Way to small.
Great for a small occasional table or desk. Remember to purchase the recommended light bulbs from Amazon. It uses a smaller bulb. Makes a super gift for a teen or child to light up their day!
It's cute, and it's miniscule. Doesn't use regular light bulbs. Wouldn't buy again, I don't think it's sturdy at all.
Use it for a hall night light works great however shade was a bit dented and rough when received
Lamp shade was dented

Works fairly well on shelf on wall above kitchen sink and is economical.  Seems a little bit green-gray, rather than straight gray, but that actually worked out better in this situation.  It would probably be better to have a lamp that does not have light coming out of the top and illuminating the boring blank wall and ceiling above, but can't afford it right now.  Overall, works somewhat well to illuminate wall art on shelf and bring some warmth to the otherwise unlit area.  (I have a larger lamp to the right side of sink and I don't use the ugly fluorescent light fixture located on the ceiling.)  You do have to non-standard light bulbs for it, but that is not really a hassle.

First off yes, it is TINY. It won’t light up an entire room. It wouldn’t be good for a desk to do your work. It is great for an accent lamp or a small bedside table which is what I got it for. It is compact for moving.

I chose a GE Lighting 22239 Energy-Smart LED 4.5-watt, 350-Lumen light bulb to use with it. Found it here on Amazon for a pretty decent price.

Yes, the bulb extends a bit over the top of the cover. This could be a bad thing if you need to reach over the lamp to turn it off or reach over it in general. I tend not to mind as the bulb I chose doesn’t burn hot at all. I found this out by accident when the lamp fell over and I accidentally touched the bulb. At that point it hadn’t been on that long.

I purposely left it on for over eight (8) hours, and wrapped the palm of my hand over the light bulb. Not cold, but not hot. It was “lukewarm” – like tap water. So, with regard to the lamp burning hot – with the bulb I got – it doesn’t. If it does, I would also look at the wiring and outlet. Again, this is my personal experience with this type of lamp and bulb combination.

The switch is awkwardly placed. I do have to position the cord carefully around to access it. This works because I do have a small area where the lamp is so that isn’t too much of an issue.

It is lightweight so moving it isn’t too much work or hassle.

It isn’t too bad of a lamp for the price.
Nice lamp but very small guess I didn't check dimensions

I was wanting something to make my apartment bathroom feel more cozy. When you have to use the bathroom at 5 am every day the last thing you want is fluorescent lights ??. This lamp was the perfect solution. I wanted it to be very small, so keep that in mind. I didn't realize how small. My fault.

The bulb sticks up above the lamp shade. I need a shorter e1240w bulb. So it's a pretty cute lamp. It looks nice. It works. Very small. Specific expensive bulb needed not a regular light bulb. I gave five stars because I would have figured this out if I read further down the description.
It's inexpensive until you buy the bulb that costs as much as the lamp. Then I guess it's still inexpensive unless you're poor like me.

Pretty straight forward to install. Needed a camera with flood light. Everything worked as it should.

Major cons:

1) You cannot MANUALLY disable motion detection lights. It is automatically controlled by a day/night sensor. You also CANNOT set the brightness when they go off. You can only MANUALLY set the brightness if you turn them on manually.

2) If you use 24/7 recording, you CANNOT screenshot or record video to your phone UNLESS you have a motion detected event. Otherwise, the options will not appear in the app for that day and you are screwed.

3) The camera does not record sharp images past 25ft. Once you get that far, forget getting a clear image both in day or night. It's meant to record things up close.

4) The app itself can crash on android and require a complete system reset on the camera. It's happened just a couple of times, but still something to consider. It also lacks some basic functionality.

This is my second device; purchased first one from a certain warehouse store. Running it for 18 months on the side of our property.

The quality of the device feels solid straight out of the box, it’s a mix of high-quality plastic and metal. The adapter mount is well designed, no fiddling around with wire nuts on the top of a ladder. The device looks to be sealed well against the outdoor elements.

Prior to final install, I use an old power cord to set the device up indoors. That way pairing with Wi-Fi, functionality and power cycling can be checked before final installation.

Device setup is straightforward through the mobile application. From a security perspective the application is basic by today’s standards, it is largely orientated around Feit’s home automation ecosystem. Smart switches, plugs, lighting, controls and sensors etc.

The application is rock solid on my old Android mobile device, either from within my home network or away from home, I can view live feeds in real time with only a few seconds of initialization delay. However, once in operation you see some caveats with the motion detector in the device.

First, it isn’t a surveillance device; it is merely a motion sensor light with a camera to capture and record the event that triggered the motion sensor. It will do continuous capture; its value is questionable.

I used the device on the perimeter of my property, approx. 12ft off the ground. It replaced an existing motion sensor light. Results were mixed, numerous false alarms with tree libs and shrubs blowing in the wind, snow, tree shadows, cats and squirrels triggering the sensor. I ended up turned off the real time event push notifications. I could see it useable in a confined space, alleyway, between buildings or where you need a push notification for someone at a doorway requesting access, since the two-way audio is useful. I wouldn’t recommend the device in high traffic areas or areas where the environment and surrounds have the potential to dynamically change in the field of view.

My second device I’ve installed over the garage door facing outward from the property, it detected the FEDEX truck passing the driveway. Detected event was 70ft from the device, on the lowest distance of the three preset motion detect zones, still questioning the consistency and reliability of the motion detector.

The price point was initially justified as requiring no monthly subscription, however other vendors have released more robust security and surveillance solutions using AI at a much lower price point. At around $150, its value proposition is questionable 18 months later.

You cannot really use the device as a tool to forewarn of illicit behavior in real time, there are too many false positives with the notifications, I got tired of looking at shadows, snow and wildlife, I disabled the push notifications. At this point with the hundreds of events photographically captured on the internal SD card, knowing exact details regarding genuine property invasion would be extremely hard work.

Its strengths are its ability to quickly live stream multiple continuous views, switch the light on/off, two-way talk and record the live stream. Its IR night capability and ability to integrate with other Feit devices in the Feit app are a strong point. You may get some mileage from playing around with sensor orientation, sensitivity and motion control zones within the software. For perimeter protection and asset surveillance there are better products out there.

this is a 6 month review. and i have had EXTENSIVE ISSUES WITH THESE CAMERAS

first, TERRIBLE customer support if you ring or email them. They acknowledged my complaint and then never followed up. I have pinged them 3x since and no response from feit. I've always called and was hung up on.
second, the app is absolutely horrible. its always stuck in a spiral of encryption(loading) and fails to load 90% of the time. i get anxiety everytime i open app because I dont know if its going to work or not.

'recording' feature: you have to reformat the SD card EVERY TIME it gets full or the camera will freak out and stop recording any events rendering your camera pretty much useless. its SUPPOSE to record over old footage, but the camera never does what its suppose to. Also. good luck trying to retrieve or view the images or video on your computer. feit uses some weird formatting for their footage and i've spent hours trying to convert to different file types so i can see the images on my computer but no success. i ended up just formatting the card. i received no useable footage from this camera despite having a critical need.

Set up is a nightmater!!! im not even talking about the complexity of installing the cameras to your home. i'm talking about the software connection after you've done all the manual labor. feit requires a step where the camera uses a qr code to connect to the app from your phone but the feit camera SUCKS and wont read it's own app qr code. You can also try wifi and bluetooth which have also failed me after 3 dozen attemps. I am not exagerating that I attempted to connect one of these cameras for over a 1 week. I went back everyday to reset, scan, and connect only to get no where. it's super frustrating because you might be on a ladder or roof trying hold your phone perfect center to the camera for minutes each connection attempt. it's tiring and dangerous. the qr code takes several minutes to 'register' if it ever does. I got lucky one day it registered the qr code.

there are so many issues hardware wise, app wise, and connection wise that these cameras are in fact an absolute waste of money. I am currently switching to nest and will set fire to these dam cameras.

reviews.review_body: I got this to go outside my back door because I'm always having to change the light on my one that is wired to the house. This seems to charge well with the sun and come on at night as needed. I've only been using it for about a month. I will report back if it lasts for years, which is what I am hoping.

DEEPEN PART # XBC001 600WATT 30000 Lumen SOLAR POWERED LED LIGHT ARRAY is supplied with Post Assembly, Brackets, Mounting Hardware, Remote Control w/ batteries and USER MANUAL.

The light assembly as received is three quarters charged ready to use.  A mounting post with bracket on the end is included for mounting the light on wall or pole.  The bracket can be placed flat on wall or through use of secondary bracket piece mounted on an additional pole or stanchion. The light assembly mounts onto the supplied post. To install requires two long and two short bolts.  The nuts fit into pre-formed holes exactly fitted ( which positions and holds the nut firm ) and can be tightened from the opposite side with the included wrench.

Operation includes exposure to Sun.  A push button on the light assembly activates the unit.  The Remote Control allows programming for user preference.  Works at half light until movement detected then brightens to full brightness.  Works quickly is my experience.

Construction is plastic material.  I Installed with slight tilt to allow rain water to drain off of the Solar Panel.

This Deepn unit is a very nice security light. I used wall mount for it and it was a piece of cake. Due to the strength of the brightness, this light is designed to be mounted higher than the other one I have. I placed it on our barn about 18 feet high.

 I like “Mode 1” in that you get 30% brightness all night, but it jumps to 100% if triggered by motion. The motion detection field of view on this light is a little better than my other light. The old light wouldn’t pick up motion right under it, only around the periphery... but this one does OK.

The unit charges easily, even on cloudy days and the light easily goes all thru the night. Brightness is very good. This light is a little more expensive than my other light, but is also slightly larger with about 50% more lighting power... so not out of line pricewise.

It's very bright and does a good job at lighting up the entire area in front of my house. It comes on automatically at dusk, and goes out when the Sun rises. It also includes the remote control so you can turn it on and off as you please, and even includes a timer function.  I have no complaints at all about this light, I hope that it lasts for many years to come. I would definitely buy it again.

This 600 watt light looks good in the neighborhood. Got two of them to light up dark areas, and they were easy to put up and install. Make sure to put in area that has good sunlight during the day, and your battery should last all night. The auto-dim feature definitely helps with battery life.

This product is one of the most successful solar items I have ever seen. It truly can collect enough solar energy during each day to keep itself lit all night. There is a setting where it alternates between different phases of brightness when the light is on, it also has very responsive motion activation, so if you're walking past it and it's in one of its lower light phases, it will brighten up to show you the way.

I have been very interested in solar power and I have experimented with dozens of different products, from tiny solar powered toys to large panels and arrays, and I can say confidently that this is a top quality solar light.

Obviously with any solar light, the amount of exposure you give it means everything. It is said that a cheap solar panel at the right angle will give more power than an expensive one at a bad angle, and with this tenet in mind I did look up exactly the best way to mount this for full exposure. I may end up adjusting the position as the seasons change, but the mounting equipment included will make that very easy.

By obtaining light each day, this product will stay lit all night. It'll shut itself off once dawn has returned and it will begin to absorb electricity again. It is very exciting to have this free source of electricity, even if it is just one light. However that one light is extremely bright, and that low heat, low energy LED looks incredible in the foliage of the backyard at night. This is truly a wonderful product and I hope to continue to rely further on solar.

If you're in a more rural area or want this to light up poles on a farm or the shed or the side of the house where there isn't constant movement at night, then this would be perfect. My complaint really isn't a complaint, I guess, just a warning about the life of the light and how suitable it is for certain situations.

Love this street light!  It really lights up the darkness on my driveway very well.  It can stay on all night at 30% and go to full brightness when it detects motion.  It seems to charge up fully quickly and has been on every morning when I get up to walk the dog in the dark.  One thing I would like is the ability for it to only come on when it senses motion rather than going from 30 - 100%.  If you want a light for safety or security, this is it.  And it's cheaper than hiring an electrician to run power out my driveway.
Says remote will work from a distance of 35 foot.  I have to be directly underneath mine which is 12’ off the ground for it to work.
The light was easy to install and it sure does lit up our backyard. We like how it spreads lights in 2 angles.
Thought it would be brighter.

I am yet to finalize the placement of this solar light but wanted to give it a try. And wow, I am quite impressed by the brightness of the light. It lights up the yard and stays on for about 5-6 hours. Even on a cloudy day, it charged up and stayed light for quite a while. even the remote range is quite good and sensitive. The build quality is pretty sturdy and will last a few years to come. I am planning to buy another one for the front yard as well. Those on the fence, go for it, you won't regret it.

It lights up well at night, has multiple settings, and stays on all night when needed. My neighbor erected a 15 ft pole at the back yard corner where ours, and another neighbors property lines meet. I bought the light. He hooked it up on the pole by himself. Now it lights up 3 backyards.  Light weight and easily operated with remote control.  I am going to buy another one now for the front yard.

I initially was going to fit this on my shed - but I discovered it was facing the wrong way and was too shady anyhow. So off to Lowes I go. Could not find a suitable metal post (needs to be at least 2 to 2.5 inches thick for the bracket to grip) - so decided on a 4x4 12ft fence post instead. Worked out well and was quite reasonable in cost. The lamp needs to get some sun - so thought needs to go into the positioning of the lamp - i.e. I doubt this would be suitable on the side of a house - unless it can be angled towards the sun somehow. I am impressed so far. See video for more info.

This solar light emits very impressive brightness. It lights up my dark parking area behind my house nicely. I now no longer have to use my cell phone light to shine my keyed lock to open my basement door. I wish i had this great light much earlier. The motion detection sensor is working flawlessly. The light has transformed darkness to day light. I like it so much that I can set brightness level and other settings from the remote control. The installation is very easy, and the mounting is very sturdyand strong. The quality is great. This product has exceeded my expectations with an outstanding customer service.  I am very happy with the purchase and very satisfied. The seller responded my questions quickly. I am getting another one for my backyard. Highly recommended. Thanks for your awesome item +++.
excelente producto 100% recomendado

I am amazed by this product. At first light in the morning it is still on. It comes on at dusk and as you can see by my photo, the light swath is very wide. You have four brightness options with the remote control, as well as passive infrared. It’s a great light and I feel so much safer as I feel it will deter criminals or anything else that would come on the property.

I am a Property Manager and I ordered theses solar lights to go over our Bocce Ball courts and they are working out great!  I also put one at the front of the neighborhood at the entrance to light up the median, as it was so dark, and residents couldn't see coming into the neighborhood late at night. These have worked out great for us! Highly recommend!

My house is on a circle and no street light.  After 6 months searching for a flood light we found Deepn 1500W Solar Street Light Outdoor the best for our front house.  It is Waterproof and love love the120000 Lumens from Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor, and the bonus is the Remote-Control, supper easy to use.  it super easy to set up.  I could not believe how bright it is.  I will buy anther one for my backyard.

I needed lights in my backyard. I had originally purchased another solar light from a different vendor, but I wasn't pleased when it arrived. I returned it and kept searching for another one. This light had so many great reviews so I purchased it. It was what I was looking for. It's pretty big, sturdy, and bright. My sons love it. They stay outside later to play basketball in the backyard. My backyard is lit up nicely. Great choice.
I like the light, but the mounting bracket is too thin and bends over time.
We’re in a windy area and 2 of the lights tilt down 2 inches.
LIGHTS UP A HUGE AREA

This light met all the needs that I had. I was looking for a light for the back side of my garage. I did not want to run electrical because I already had a nightlight on the front but this was perfect. It has great brightness really lights up the area I love having remote control to be able to change the settings at any time but most of the time I run the light all night long it runs at 30% and last throughout the night with no problem you will first need a full days charge the first night I used it The batteries ran out, but since then it has worked great once it had a full days charge  The 30% brightness gives me just enough light so that I can see clearly if there is motion in the area the light goes to full brightness for about a minute the install was easy I suggest you use at least a 2 inch pipe galvanized the bracket fits it perfect  Unless you’re mounting it to a building or something solid as far as brightness and the install, I’m a satisfied, customer light also has Ron times of 2,3,4, hours or it can be turned completely off with the remote I just use auto, and it runs nightly automatically comes on at dusk

We had a motion sensing solar light attached to our gate. It would turn on when we opened the gate at night.  We back into our driveway through a gate and into the garage. The solar light on the gate was not bright enough.  We often could not see the gate posts in the backup camera.

I purchased two of these lights and now when my gate opens it's like daylight out lighting up my driveway.  We can now safely back into our driveway in the darkest of night.
.
El material es plástico y no parece de muy buena calidad. Y por el tamaño debería alumbrar mucho mas
There is nothing to dislike about this solar light. Looks great, great coverage. I really like the motion detection feature.
These seem twice as bright as the 1500 watt lights I bought last year. Located in high desert with very few lights, these light up a huge area!!!

These lights are the worst. Even after a full day of charging they last maybe 2 hours and completely die. Save your money. I bought 10 to light up our parking lot that has no shade, still very poor charging and I bought the top of the line. DO NOT WASTE MONEY ON BUYING THESE!
Great for lighting up the dumpster area at work! Bright!
These light are working out great, very bright and easy to install.
I like the fact it was easy to install. Only wish it was brighter. I have it on a 20' pole maybe up too high. The remote is handy

This is a good light Just have to learn how the battery indicator works. Until fully charged it shows only the light intensity of charging light. At night when it's on it shows battery level. Remote is pretty picky. But light duration is great, brightness very good.

I couldn't be happier with this purchase! This product is absolutely fantastic and has exceeded all my expectations. The quality is top-notch, and it performs exactly as described.

I've been using it for less than a year, and it has made a remarkable difference in light and efficiancy. The durability and reliability are impressive, and it's clear that a lot of thought went into its design.

product_title: WORX 50026858 Trivac Leaf Collection Bag WGBAG500
product_description: Replacement Bag for WG505 WG509 WG500 WG501 WG502 WG508 Full length zipper for easy dumping of mulched leaves Holds up to 10 gallons of mulched leaves Slides and twists on without any tools

reviews.review_body: It's my husband's, but I'm pretty sure he likes it. He said it's easier to get on and off than his old one.
review_topics: easy to get on and off

reviews.review_body: So expensive and they rip pretty easily unless really well cared for. I just throw them on the ground in my garage and had to replace it after a year or two due to holes and zipper malfunction. I’m going to be more careful with this replacement.
Tried 2 aftermarket leaf bags and both were basically garbage ...the zippers broke after one use. This one is an Original WORX bag and is just fine...very pleased/.

Even though I used the model number from my blower/vac, the bag that came goes on, but does not stay attached.  As soon as I turn it on, the bag blows off.  I had to hold it on with my hand in order to get it to work.  This was extremely irritating.  I tried every thing to get it on, and can't figure out what I'm doing wrong, if anything.  Some directions would have been nice.  I guess I'll resort to duct tape.

UPDATE:  After messing with this again, I finally figured it out.  It now stays attached, but directions would have been easier and not wasted my time.
It fits and works, but after 3 uses the zipper is getting stuck, but the original only lasted a year.  So will need to get more but they only let you get one.
It works well, except  I still get  dust coming out from time to time.
This newer version bag is so much easier to attach than the original version!
The WORX collection bag installs and removes easily. I struggled with the prior bag, this bags is a good improvement, Always removes and re-installed with ease.

Or have some Gorilla tape or creative DIY worx bag repair skills in your back pocket.  The blower/vacuum works great, but  once you own it they've got you by the cajones and you'll be replacing these bags, or repairing them, within every 2 dozen or so uses.  You'll only be able to repair it yourself if you're lucky enough to have the seam split or zipper break at the end of the zipper run.  This (pic) happened ONLY after a few uses...  What frustrates me the most is these bags/zippers have become cheaper in quality over time and I'm guessing I know the reason why.  Charge an extra 10 bucks and put in a beefier zipper and a few more stitches for pete's sake. The zippers are so small and delicate for this kind of use that they clog almost immediately.  You have to constantly babysit them by knocking out any debris and even lubricating them with some silicone...... They zipper splines fall out of alignment repeatedly so you're having to move them back into place with a toothpick or paper clip (I really enjoy doing this, don't get me wrong...cuz I definitely  have the time and patience to fiddle with this kind of thing)......OR just suck it up and buy 2-3 replacements for the year and be annoyed like me.
I got this one to replace the one that originally came with my blower. Within 1 month it started coming apart at the seams next to the neck. It took the original bag over 1 year to do that.

It was exactly what I needed. The original bag had a hole in it. I tried taping it, then gluing it. That bought me a little time.
 We'll see how long it lasts. As far as ease of use, no complaints.
Perfect

This replacement is better than the bag that came with the blower. This is mainly due to the way that the bag attaches to the blower via the spring loaded connection rather than the awkward twist that the OEM bag used. The construction of the bag is just as good as the original so I expect it to hold up for a few years at least.

After purchasing this replacement bag for my Worx Tri-vac it fit well.  But after just one month of use the bag split in three separate places.  This amazed me as the original bag lasted me for years.  It's as if they went from a woven material to one with plastic in it.  Another quality item down the drain.  Do not waste your money or time.  Thank you
Works great. This is much better than the one that came with the blower(blower is about 6 to 8 years old)
I was glad I was able to simply replace the bag from the original manufacturer without buying a whole new vacuum.
This purchase was a replacement bag since the original one tore. It works great which should allow us to have a few more years to use our leaf vacuum.
This is a replacement item that has a major improvement over the original. The system for attaching and removing it from the machine is greatly improved.

We have used this new bag twice as a vacuum for leaves and the material around the zipper is already fraying and a hole already in the side of the bag.  The material is not heavy and durable. Very disappointed.
Delivered as advertised.  Had a replica that didn’t last, this looks sturdier and actually fits as expected.
It was just as described.

The original bag that came with the vacuum tool lasted 5 years; this replacement bag after just one year of use is starting to tear and looks like it won't last much longer. Very disappointing. Also, the zipper on the original bag went around the corner, making emptying much easier; the zipper on this replacement bag does not go around the corner, so emptying is more difficult.
I bought this bag for my neighbor. No I'm not nice like that, just so happens that I ran his over with my lawn tractor. Oops. Anyways delivery came quick appears to be OEM. He said it works fine.

Last year I purchased a generic off-brand replacement. It worked okay but the stitching and zipper broke. So I decided to spend a little more on this one. HUGE improvement! The material this is made of makes you leaf collector so much more powerful! Very high quality! Seams are well sewn and the zipper is larger.

This fits perfectly.  One change (which I believe I do like) is the bag-side closest to operator is now not-breathing vinyl, thus filtered discharge air isn't blowing against you.  The one side that IS porous for filtration / discharge, appears sufficient.... (original bag from several years' ago purchase of blower/vac, was with BOTH sides made of breathable fabric...)
None

Found my leaf vac at a thrift store for $15.  If you think it's weak, upgrade your extension cord to at least 14ga.  These things pull 12 amps and the 16ga cords can't flow the juice.  Fits perfectly, zipper seems strong.
I've used the Worx blower/vac for about 7 years and eventually wear out the collecting bag but Worx even upgraded the bag connection for ease.
I'm glad I was able to to find a replacement bag so easy for my leaf vac. It made getting up the leaves around the pool so much easier.
Fit onto the Machine, just have to line up Tabs and push till it Clicks into place. Easier to remove than the Original bag... My wife Loves it!!!
I like it but the original one zipped slightly further which made it easier to empty.

This bag has worked very well for me as a replacement.  The new latch fitting works much better than the old twist and lock.  I have not had this bag disengage like the original and it has held up very well over several uses. The only down side is that it is smaller than the original so it does not hold as much debris.
Some dust escapes from the bag. It doesn’t fit as snug on the machine as the original, but it’s much easier to take off and on.

Update 11/22/2022---I thought I was happy for the most part but now I'm dissapointed. I originally purchased this on Sept 2 2022. It's now Nov 22 and the bag is already ripped and blowing out of the rear near the zipper. The corner seems to be the weak spot. If I buy another one then I could have just purchased another blower that came with a new bag. I'll be looking for an alternative brand in the future. That realls stinks because I like the blower/vacuum itself. Just the bag sucks (no pun intended).

My old bag (no not her the one on the vacumm lol) finally gave out after a few great years. Blower still runs strong so I ordered this new bag. Fits perfectly. The strap is a little long and if I don't use it then it gets sucked up in to the tube. Not a huge problem but something to note for safety. What I didn't care for which it seems many do is that the zipper only opens on the far end now instead of around the 2 sides. This makes it harder to empty. I now have to scoop the leaves out with my hands first to empty the bag. I didn't need to do this with the old one. The old style opening on 2 sides made it much easier to empty. Otherwise it's great.
Perfect was correct product
bag is light weight and doesn't seem as bulky as the original.  works well with my older blower.

I had to replace the bag on my Worx leaf blower/vacuum. I bought the Works blower/vacuum 12 years ago and the bag had many holes in it. I bought this replacement bag and it’s even better than the original. The old design was very hard to take off and on but the new design works with an easy snap. I would definitely recommend. Love It!
I desperately needed to replace my bag and so glad I finally did.

Just received new bag for my leaf blower . At first I thought it would not fit but the new adapter is the best. Much easier to remove
It’s great

It snaps on easily . The new strap is longer which suits me better.  The zipper closes well . It is shorter in length than the original. The bag itself seems sturdy. The original bag held up well . The failure on the original was in the plastic attachment part.
  I like using the device because it creates a very clean look on the ground after use and the device chops the leaves up so they may breakdown faster in the pile.

I love this bag. This is the 2nd bag I have purchased. I have alot of large acorns which eventually put holes in the bag. Duct tape wasn’t a great fix so I bought a new bag. I try to avoid vacuuming sharp items. Not sure there’s anyway to avoid such things and hope this one lasts longer.

Perfect replacement for an old bag that was ripping after years of use. The zipper is slightly smaller but it’s better this way since you don’t have to pull the zipper around a corner. Fits well on the vacuum and the zipper makes a decent seal.

This product fit like it came with the blower.  The snap on and off clamp feature makes the job so much easier.  I have model 500 and this clamp on/off feature was not part of the package when I purchased around 8 to 9 years ago.  I was concerned about it fitting properly to achieve the right suction, as the configuration for connecting was entirely different (my machine had a twist and pull off the bag function) but it seems to work more effectively.  I choose the manufacturer's replacement, which cost more than the other options offered, and glad I did.  Fit like it came with the blower/vacuum.  This zipper is more industrial (the reason I had to purchase) and the placement makes it so much easier to empty.
Love it!!

Had to replace my original bag of two years after a critter ate through it over the winter.  Since this is a factory replacement, it is exactly the same.  So, no issue with fit.  My only concern is the durability of the zipper.  You have to baby it or I get the feeling it will break, BUT, it hasn't yet on either of the two I've owned.
The corners of the bag, the ones facing the ground, could do with some reinforcement.  One wore clear through on first use.

The zipper is better than the original zipper.  The bag material is of better quality.  The zipper does not interfere with the operation of the zipper.  The bag material is more of canvas quality and not just cloth. I have only used my new bag once but could unzippe the bag and empty and rezippe in the time it would have taken just to unzipp the old one.
My old bag was ripping apart and it's nice to finally have once that doesn't have holes and blow leaves everywhere.  Great replacement.
Old one after much use had holes. New one seems to be made of a better quality material.
This bag attaches much better than previous bag
A bit smaller than the original. The zipper is straight line unlike the original which curved around a corner and sometimes got snagged. Very satisfied

While the quality of this product is worth the money….we have a model WG500 and the nozzle that came with the bag did not adapt to our model.  My husband ended up using a zip Tie and the adapter from the original bag to make the new bag work.  It will work absolutely fine for us but I was just disappointed that the ad said the new bag nozzle would work on our model when it absolutely does not!
This is my third or fourth bag.  The bags seem to tear easily or the stitching doesn’t seem to hold up as well as I thought it would.
The new bag was not as sturdy as my original purchase years ago.

After having this item for over a year  Iam still satisfied with this purchase. Years prior to this purchase, I purchased the Worx leaf blower/collector which still works and I am not very careful with it. My neighbor has been buying the latest leaf machines ie, mowers, suction machine and blowers and (power wise) none of them has either outlast or accomplished what I can with my worx leaf blower/suction machine. I have had my blower so long that if it went bad (with the work that I have done with it) I would buy none of than another Worx. I hope this company never goes out of business.
read the heading

It’s functional and does the job. Collects enough to get my front yard done, then I empty it and proceed with the backyard to retain a better suction. Strong material, so I’m not worried about a hole being poked with this bag. If it fits your vacuum, I say go for it!
I got tired of dealing with the gas jobs. This electric job works and lasts far longer.

The zipper on the original WORX 50026858 Trivac Leaf Collection Bag shipped with the blower/vac completely opened the side plus 4 inches on the bottom of the bag. Opening in this fashion allowed the bag to be emptied quickly and completely. The new bag does not open the 4 inches on the bottom. This prevents the bag from emptying quickly. Leaves need to be pulled from the bag adding minutes to the time to empty. Why change a good thing?
The Worxbag I just received was the best bag I needed. My old bag was very hard to use but this bag was fantastic. Thank you to Worx and Amazon for getting me a great worxbag. Thank you all..
Product works great
I get it sooner that I was expecting and fits my machine great, it's working very good ??
The bags are good quality. They last when taken care of, make sure if bag gets wet give time to dry. Don't let it drag on the ground. Enjoy!

This is well made, easy to put on and take off of the blower/vacuum, but unfortunately they shortened up the zipper so that no longer goes around the corners, which results in its being more difficult to empty, thus the loss of one star.

This works fine with the WG500 model as a replacement bag. There are two main updates from the original that are definite improvements: the zipper and the attachment collar. The zipper is more heavy-duty than the one on the original, which is a very welcome improvement since the zipper is usually the first thing to break. Additionally, the zipper no longer wraps around the edge of the bag, but is straight across the bottom. That is also a plus for durability.

The attachment collar now has a quick-release system so you no longer need to twist it on/off. The quick release works well, both in terms of ease of release as well as remaining firmly in place during use.

My only quibble is that the new zipper, while better than the old one, is still not as sturdy as I would have liked. To maintain as long of a lifespan as possible, it's a good idea to lube the zipper teeth with wax (or something similar) to keep it operating smoothly.

This bag works perfectly with my WG502 blower/shredder.  It is easy to attach with the twist and turn and the heavier zipper that opens on the end of the bag lessens the chance of zipper failure. I used it as soon at it was delivered and it works great! I will order another one to have a spare. Great product!! Thanks!!

This bag was purchased to replace the original leaf bag that came with our Trivac 3-in-One. The old one had broken down. The zipper tore away from the bag. This new leaf bag works perfectly and fits well. Our old blower was a WG500.2, and purchased in 2018, in case you need assurance that it will fit. We were very happy with the purchase!!

This toilet seat allows him to be able to pee without having to either use a stool or lift the seat up before he goes to the potty.
Well, it's a toilet seat.  The criteria for success is that it fits and it's comfortable.  This checks both those boxes and the price was excellent as well.  My employee's butts are happy.

This seat is commercial grade HD which I needed to transfer from a wheelchair to toilet and has worked out great. The front opening made clean-up easier and the heavy duty construction made transfers a snap. If you have a oblong American Standard I would recommend this seat for you.
Caution: Do not over tighten the steel seat bolts - it will crack the bowl.  I used an old nylon nut instead for safety.
Great product ??

No, seriously. It's a simple design that has less to brake.  All metal hardware included. Much better than the original cheap seat and lid that was provided when the building was built. Less surface area to collect to liquids, and no chipboard underneath! Perfect for a business, or public toilet!

I love this seat it is very  sturdy,  durable it don’t move like the others I buy, where they pop and breaks. I am a heavy woman and I pop so many seats I could never find the right one but this one is the best and very comfortable. I recommend to all heavy sitters.

great seat  for  push button  toilet - you  can  easily  get  to  the  buttons  &  the  hardware  for  the  seat  is  very  sturdy  so  the  seat  doesn't  move .  This  is  a  very  reasonable  price  & if  you're  tired  of  going  over  the  top  of  the  lid  to  push  the  button - this  is  a  solution
Only gave 4 stars because the bolt and washer are to small and go right through when I try to tighten them. Other than that it is exactly what I was looking for.

No my son doesn’t have to lift up the seat which is hard for him. This is also like commercial grade with metal fittings, tough.

My fat friend who cracked the old one has dropped massive bombs on this one and it’s solid.

So if your heavy and take huge dumps this is the one for you!

Also much harder to accidentally pee on the seat!

I've been looking all over for this type of toilet seat and I couldn't find one anywhere.  My wife found it on Amazon and I couldn't be happier.  I've had it now for about 2 months and it is high quality.  It was exactly what I was looking for and both my wife and I are happy.  Men as long as you have good aim it eliminates the argument over what position the toilet seat was left in. :)
All is good

This is a very comfortable toilet seat, and it fit our American Standard toilet perfectly. My only problem is that the nuts that hold it down in back keep coming loose so that it strays off-center at times. I think this is easy to fix, though, by taking time to get a couple of wrenches to tighten both at the same time, against each other. Hand-tightening won't hold for too long.

We replaced several seats in our building with these. They are easy to install, although at the end of tightening the nut, you do need to give it a good tight turn to engage the spring washer. We're happy with the hidden hinges as the ones that were replaced collected grossiness, so it's nice to have all of that hidden. I also like the round seals as the rectangular ones move out of position and look unsightly.
This is a sturdy product that I recommend for anyone with a waist size less than 44 inches. If you have a little more "seat"" than that
I must have ordered this quickly...but be sure to note that there is no toilet seat lid included.
I don't know how but people break these in half. anyway they work good and are easy to put on.
My son kept flopping down on previous seats and I had to replace seats regularly...This seat is more stable and sturdy...Easy to install and best purchase ever...I sooooo got my money's worth

I love the the way it installs. No more wiggly seat. STAINLESS fasteners  ( not plastic  ).  The seat design gently separates your cheeks for less mess and more comfort. And at a very very affordable price.  WTG  American standard !! For a product I can use every day .
Good toilet seat to use for commercial use.
It's nice and compliant to hold my sweet cheeks :)  Seriously it does the job you're buying it for.

We've been using this toilet seat for a little over a year now, and it has not given us any problems. We have an insurance agency that has two bathrooms one for the men and one for the women. The men's bathroom toilet seat broke and instead of calling the plumber, I checked Amazon and found this toilet seat, it was super easy to install, it came with all the hardware, only took about 10 minutes to install.\, and it's very comfortable when I've had to use it, I've also received some other complements from the people that have had the pleasure of using the new seat, (big improvement from the broken one I guess). If we ever have any problems with the women's bathroom toilet seat I'll buy this American Standard Toilet Seat from Amazon again it's exceeded my exceptions.
Fit perfectly

product_title: ALPHA BIDET iX Hybrid Bidet Toilet Seat in Elongated White Endless Warm Water Stainless Steel Nozzle 4 Wash Functions LED Nightlight Warm Air Dryer Wireless Remote Oscillation and Pulse
product_description: LUXURY QUALITY ENTRY PRICE We dare you to find a higher quality bidet seat with this many features for under 300 ADVANCED HYBRID HEATING Ceramic core heating technology means you get endless warm water from start to finish Oh and it s energy efficient too STAINLESS STEEL NOZZLE It s durable it s hygienic it just makes sense Our stainless steel nozzle will wash itself wash you wash itself again and then tuck itself to bed ILLUMINATING LED NIGHTLIGHT The cool blue LED nightlight is great for nighttime bathroom trips and dropping your guests jaws It s a crowd pleaser THE ALPHA BIDET DIFFERENCE Our bidet seats are sleek built to last and designed for the modern bathroom Advance your hygiene with Alpha Bidet

reviews.review_body:
It was very easy to install, we did have to look up online one part of putting it together just because we didn’t want to mess it up and the instructions weren’t clear enough on that part but it was easily found online and we got it taken care of. I love the features, I love the endless warm water, the heated seat, how clean I feel after using it! I would absolutely recommend this bidet. The remote control is easy to use and you can just stick it on your wall rather than having to mount something to the wall.

I purchased this bidet after first trying another brand and I’m so glad I returned that one and gave this one a shot even though the brand wasn’t as familiar to me. Give it a try you won’t be disappointed!

Works great, no complaints except the seat doesn't stay latched to the base, so we have to keep pushing it back to get it to click in. Water is warm but the initial blast is whatever temp the pipes are. Even so, I'd buy it again.

I bought this for my husband, but I am now using it.  To combat the dryer smell, I put a hanging deodorizer close to the opening of the vent. Also, I cracked the seat, but since this was bought through Bidet King's store, I received a replacement within a few days of contacting them.

I really wanted this to work, especially because there aren't alot of round bidets in the market. I'm disappointed. My biggest issue is that the dryer barely blows any air. Also, the design is a bit too chunky and is not the most comfortable to sit on. Unfortunately,  I will have to return this product.

Having traveled extensively to Asia, I can no longer live without bidets.  I've purchased $900 seats, $500 seats, and $30 attachments.  For me, the most important features I look for now are 1) a strong spray 2) consistent warm water and 3) sturdy seat.

This ix hybrid hits all three points for me.  I tried other brands in this price range and the spray is either too soft, or the water doesn't stay warm throughout.  I took a chance on the ix because we have their other model JX in another house.  That one's been great so we were excited to try this new one for our home in Vegas.

The spray is solid, the temp stays warm and it feels sturdy enough.  The lid doesn't feel flimsy either.  My wife prefers the regular rear wash and I like the stronger rear+ mode.  I wasn't aware it had a dryer when I bought it, but it's on there as well.  The blue led light is just the icing on the cake.  Great product at any price.
If some think is go Wong good like. I got it after 6month seat is Brock . Got no were with seller. They do not honor their warranty.

This is our second Bidet from Alpha and the first one lasted 3+ years.  The new Bidet only lasted 5 months.  Small plastic pieces started to fall off about 4 months after we installed it and I couldn't figure out where they were coming from until a hose started slowly leaking.  The hose that enters the bidet finally gave out one day and water was spraying all over the bathroom.  It was a good thing that we were still at home as it would have flooded the bathroom.  I reached out to Alpha and have had no response back as to any warrenty or if problem can be fixed.  Very disappointed.

Seat is smaller, this is my first bidet seat for my elongated toilet but with this installed it makes seat smaller, more like a round toilet seat.  I love it besides that, the seat stays warm all the time unless on eco mode, I love the remote & it also had 3 buttons on the side of seat.  Easy to install but you have to have a gfi outlet near toilet, I had to install one like most people will so that is an expense you need to factor in. Overall all love it, warm water, warm toilet seat, night light, air dryer but in my experience you won't fully get rid of toilet paper.

It has all the features you would expect at this price, the bonus is the hybrid warm water system. It's not a commonly available on a bidet at this price point. The fact that the price was lowered by $40 after I made my purchase annoyed me a bit. It comes with a 1 year manufacturer warranty whis is pretty standard.
